items.content_html: **Description**: Input DateTime Picker is a React-based, lightweight, and customizable component for intuitive date and time selection. It features responsive design, accessible UI, built-in validation, and seamless integration into modern web applications.

It features responsive design, accessible UI, built-in validation, and seamless integration into modern web applications.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
